name: Into the Storm (axelvborn)
description:
Into the Storm is a short narrative airplane flight game. The story follows an early aviator deciding to brave a storm with his small plane to discover the world that lies beyond the clouds as he goes deeper into the storm.

Note : There is a secret ending to the game.
Hint : There’s a point of no return, don’t cross it for the secret ending.

Controls Keyboard

Flight Controls : WS  (Pitch) / AD (Yaw) / QE (Roll)
Arrow keys (or gamepad joystick) can be used as alternatives to WASD.

Any Key : Any key

Credits Ressources used

Dark and Stormy Skybox
Various SFX
Google Cloud Text-To-Speech (sorry for the soulless narrator)

Thanks to

Sought & Daviul for their suggestions and feedback over the duration of the Ludum Dare.
